text:
—As they went deeper and deeper,
the temperature inside the volcano rose.

Drops of sweat fell and
evaporated the moment they touched the ground,
leaving no trace.

name: Ryusei
text:
...Ganran-san, you seem quite out of breath,
are you alright?

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, I can still go!
Ryusei, how's your arm?
Don't overdo it.

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, I'm fine, thank you.
...But, this heat is quite tough.

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
To think we could continue our
sauna endurance contest here!

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha, that's right.
It's like a Garunderra-style sauna.
I'd like to go together again, all of us this time!

As Ryusei spoke,
he glanced at his device's display.

There was an emergency alert indicating high temperatures.
And the remaining ViewPower was steadily decreasing.

name: Ryusei
text:
...Ganran-san.
It seems we don't have much time
until it runs out.

name: Ryusei
text:
We need to rendezvous with reXer-kun and the others,
and quickly take down the boss monster.
Let's hurry—
The monster's roar drowned out Ryusei's words.

name: Monsters
text: —Gigii, Gih...!!

name: Ganran
text:
A monster...!?
Even though the operator isn't here,
it appeared...!

name: Ryusei
text:
It's a shame about our endurance contest,
but we've got another interruption.
It's going to be tough to ignore it and move forward...!

name: Ganran
text:
Besides, we don't even know if we can rendezvous...
We can't waste time here!

Without a moment's delay,
the monster launched an attack,
sending rocks flying from its body.

name: Ganran
text:
—Tch! You're attacking,
so you must be ready to be hit, right!?

Ganran directed a sharp gaze at the Kaibutsu, readied his Parallel Weapon,
checked his surroundings, and spoke to Ryusei.

name: Ganran
text:
...Ryusei.
I have a favor to ask you.
Will you listen?

name: Ryusei
text:
What is it, Ganran-san?
We have to defeat this monster quickly and move forward—

Ganran nodded quietly
and continued speaking.

name: Ganran
text:
...I'll take on all of them,
so could you go ahead and search for
the path that continues forward?

name: Ganran
text:
Our transformation won't last much longer.
Defeating these guys and moving forward
is a race against time.

name: Ganran
text:
You have more stamina and
speed than I do, don't you?

name: Ryusei
text:
...B-But!
If your transformation wears off,
even Ganran-san would be in too much danger—

As if to interrupt Ryusei's words,
Ganran slammed his hammer to the ground.

name: Ganran
text:
Even though our acquaintance has only been a few short days,
I've grown fond of you all.

name: Ganran
text:
I'm glad we could become companions
and fight together like this!

name: Ganran
text:
...That's why I want to entrust that job to you.
...Don't you understand?
At those powerful words, Ryusei quietly gazed at Ganran. And then—

name: Ganran
text:
—Go!
I'm counting on you!

name: Ryusei
text:
Ganran-san...
...Understood.

After a moment of hesitation,
Ryusei closed his eyes, shook off his doubt,
and started running towards the path ahead.

name: Ganran
text:
...Ah, that's fine.
Those guys aren't the
kind to give up like this.

name: Monster
text: —Gigyaaaoo...!!

name: Ganran
text:
Come!
Your opponent is me—

It was when Ganran swung his hammer high.
A shadow, from above, headed towards the monster.

name: Ryusei
text:
—Still, I don't understand!
I'll fight too!
That way it'll be twice as fast!

name: Ryusei
text:
Then, let's both rendezvous with reXer-kun and the others together!
We will definitely get there even faster!

Ryusei, who had kicked away the monster,
wiped his sweat and shouted loudly at Ganran.

name: Ganran
text: ...Ryusei. You...

name: Ganran
text:
...Ah, right!
Then, let's put our spirit into it
and finish this quickly together!!

name: Ryusei
text: Yeah! Let's go, Ganran-san!!

name: Hitomi
text:
...When there are only three of us,
it feels a bit quiet.

Taking a different path from Ganran and the others,
[Player] and the others followed the presence,
proceeding without saying much to each other.

options.text: ...I wonder if Ganran-san and the others are safe.

text:
[Player]'s words were swallowed by
the sound of magma flowing in the volcano.

Both Hitomi and reXer remained silently downcast,
moving their feet as they searched for words to reply.

name: Hitomi
text:
...I'm sure they'll be fine.
Ganran-san and Ryusei-san,
both of them promised us!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, that's right.
All we can do is believe in that.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
The two of them will definitely rejoin with us.
We can't let our spirits be defeated.

Hitomi and reXer looked up and spoke,
as if to encourage [Player].
However—

Unable to find any more words,
Hitomi and reXer fell silent.

Both of them were worried about Ganran and Ryusei,
whom they had left behind,
and their expressions remained clouded.

options.text: ...reXer's suit, if you'd let me take a look.
By the way, why is it that form?
I think it'd be easier to command if I knew.

text:
As if searching for a brighter topic,
[Player] pointed to reXer's new hero suit.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, I need to
let [Player] know too.

name: Hitomi
text:
It's a really cool design!
It looks like it came straight out of a game.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Actually,
I've seen this design before.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
It's very similar to a game equipment
my father showed me a long time ago.
ow about it, isn't it cool?

reXer spread his arms,
showing the inside of the suit.

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, it's very wild!
Did reXer-san also play that game?

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, I played it a lot.
My father was mainly in charge of developing
and directing that game.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
It was equipment design he made at that time.
He said it would be obtainable after defeating
the boss of a super-high difficulty stage.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I was excited, thinking I'd clear it first,
definitely showing my father that equipment, but—

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...In the end, my father disappeared before that,
so it was never implemented in the game.

name: reXer?
text:
"—■■■■■.
The next stage is quite difficult.
It's [Forbidden Volcano: Gatoenavotom]."

name: reXer?
text:
"It's the highest difficulty ever,
a difficult stage that only a handful of players can clear, but..."

name: reXer?
text:
"If it's ■■■■■, you'll surely be fine.
For you, that's probably just slightly more challenging, right?"

reXer spoke,
recalling those times with a nostalgic expression,
stringing his words together.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
At that time, I wasn't a swordsman,
I only played around with the Hunter title.

name: Hitomi
text:
Is that so?
That's a bit surprising.

name: Hitomi
text:
I had a strong image of reXer-san's
weapon being a sword Parallel Weapon.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
As you know,
my father used an ax-sword.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
We often played together,
so it was easier to maneuver
if our roles didn't overlap.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
That's why I used a crossbow.
It's like this Parallel Weapon.
So, I was a little surprised.

options.text: Maybe it's based on memories from that time.
It's because you tried to fight with your own strength.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Actually, that wasn't the only
reason I used a crossbow.

Nodding at [Player],
reXer gazed at the Parallel Weapon in his hand.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
If I used the same weapon,
I had no chance of winning against my father.
I always lost due to the difference in skill.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Even if I fought and lost,
I used to make excuses to myself,
saying it was because it was a different weapon, a different role.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Also, and...
I simply liked the cool appearance.
Is that too childish?

reXer scratched his head, looking a little embarrassed.
However, Hitomi spoke up in response.

name: Hitomi
text:
—That's not true at all!
I think "looking cool" is a wonderful reason!

name: Hitomi
text:
I'm the same, because for me,
"cute" is incredibly important!

name: Hitomi
text:
I want everyone who supports me to think,
'She's an idol!'

name: Hitomi
text:
Before filming,
I always check my bangs to make sure they don't get messed up,
and I'm happy when I get to be on camera!

options.text: Your bangs are never allowed to get messed up!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, yes!
For an idol, "cute" bangs are very important!

options.text: You use a lot of hairspray, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah—, [Player]-san!
For an idol, "bangs" are very important!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Indeed, Hitomi is always an idol.
Even in battles, she'd support the fight with her singing.

name: Hitomi
text:
I want to deliver hope
to everyone through my singing.

name: Hitomi
text:
...It might be more effective to hit with a mic stand,
or use punches and kicks, but...

name: Hitomi
text:
That's not cute for an idol warrior,
so it's really, really a last resort, you know...

Hitomi clenched her fist tightly.
Her expression was filled with determination.
Then, she turned to reXer and smiled.

name: Hitomi
text:
So, for me, "cute" is the same
as "cool" for reXer-san, isn't it?

name: Hitomi
text:
I think that's a perfectly valid reason!
...Is it a bit too childish?

options.text: I don't think so at all!
I think both of your reasons are wonderful.
That's the form of your dreams.

text:
At [Player]'s and Hitomi's words,
reXer let out a small laugh.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Thank you both.
Hearing that, I feel a little relieved.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I wanted to hold a cool weapon
and fight alongside my father.
...My reason was just that.

Seeing reXer's nostalgic expression,
Hitomi smiled happily.

name: Hitomi
text:
...reXer-san.
You really love your father, don't you?
I think it's a wonderful form of love.

name: Hitomi
text:
My parents are from Earth and an alien race,
so being a half-breed, I had many worries.

name: Hitomi
text:
...But, it's the same as reXer-san.
I love both my father and mother very much!

name: Hitomi
text: Before, [Player]-san taught me about being brave.

name: Hitomi
text:
I was also really scared to hold someone's hand,
because I felt like I might hurt them.

Hitomi opened her hands
and gazed at them.

name: Hitomi
text:
...I-I'm so sorry!
I broke the tool you so kindly lent me...!

name: Hitomi
text:
Ganran-san made it, didn't he...?
I'll return it right away...!
I'm truly sorry!

name: Hitomi
text:
Little by little,
I've been able to control my power,
but even so, I still sometimes make mistakes.

name: Hitomi
text:
But, I have to be brave and overcome it—
I've come to think that I can't be spoiled forever.

name: Hitomi
text:
Now, I want to show that
feeling to my parents too.

name: Hitomi
text:
To stand on my own feet and
aim to be a cute idol on my own.

name: Hitomi
text:
I think showing them that I'm working hard like that
will be my way of returning their kindness!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Standing on my own feet,
huh...

reXer muttered,
and at that moment.
—Gooooohhhhh...!

A giant roar vibrated through the heated winds.
The moment that sound was heard,
the two switched to their hero expressions.

options.text: We'll continue our conversation after we return to the village!

name: Hitomi
text:
...Yes!
We're ready!
Let's go!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, the path ahead seems more unstable than before.
Let's proceed with extreme caution!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Let's defeat the monster and
suppress the volcanic rampage!

Nodding at reXer's words,
the three ran forward.

[Player] was running,
fighting against the powerful presence overflowing from in front of them.

However, at that moment,
they also sensed a different presence from behind.

At that voice,
Hitomi and reXer turned their heads, startled.

In their line of sight, a path opened,
and monsters began to appear one after another
from behind rocks, and from within the magma.

name: Hitomi
text: ...The monsters are surging from behind too!!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
If this many monsters pour in—
There's no escape in an area with so much magma!
[Player] is in danger!

name: Hitomi
text:
...But, we can't stop here!
First, let's run over there!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Damn it, there's no choice!
[Player], can you run?

options.text: It's alright, I can do it!

text:
[Player], reXer, and Hitomi
ran towards the area ahead.

However, coupled with the unstable footing,
the swarm of monsters gradually closed in.

name: Hitomi
text:
—At this rate, everyone...!
...Alright!!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Hitomi, quickly over here!
If you're late, the swarm of monsters will...!

At reXer's voice, Hitomi looked up.
Her eyes glowed with a burning, strong light.

name: Hitomi
text:
...
Sorry, reXer-san, [Player]-san.

Hitomi muttered, lowered her gaze,
then, having made a decision on her own,
she faced the swarm of monsters in front of her.

name: Hitomi
text:
—But, I want to protect
the people that are precious to me!

name: Hitomi
text:
reXer-san and [Player]-san,
please take care of the mosnters ahead!

name: Hitomi
text:
What should I do—
Oh, I don't have time to worry right now!
Please just leave this to me.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
What...!
It's dangerous to face that swarm of monsters alone!

options.text: I can't let you do that...!

text:
To the two who raised their voices,
Hitomi smiled powerfully.

name: Hitomi
text:
...I will definitely hold back these monsters!
I will absolutely not lose!

name: Hitomi
text:
Besides,
I'm sure Ryusei-san and Ganran-san
will come right away!

name: Hitomi
text:
So, please!
—Believe in me!

Immediately after, Hitomi punched the rock wall
they had just passed through, so no one would see her.

The impact shook the wall,
and the loosened rocks began to collapse all at once.

Just before the rocks collapsed,
[Player] sent all their ViewPower to Hitomi.

name: Hitomi
text:
—[Player]-san!
Thank you!

name: Hitomi
text:
I will definitely return!
Please, somehow...!
Stop the volcano's rampage—

With those last words,
Hitomi disappeared beyond the collapsed rocks.
Only burning dust danced in the air.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text: —Hitomi—!!

name: Hitomi
text:
[Player]-san, reXer-san.
...Both of you, I'm sorry
for doing as I pleased.

name: Hitomi
text:
Papa, Mama...
I'm still... a little scared.

name: Hitomi
text:
I almost said,
'Please remember me forever.'
But—

name: Hitomi
text: I can't afford to say that!

The scorching winds from the collapsing rock wall,
and the intense heat of the magma—

They haphazardly messed up Hitomi's bangs
as they swept upwards.

However, without paying any attention to it,
Hitomi quietly looked up and muttered, and convinced herself.

In front of her eyes,
the swarm of monsters relentlessly closed in.

name: Hitomi
text:
...I promised I'd definitely return.
So I absolutely cannot lose!

name: Hitomi
text:
—Papa, Mama.
I'll fight with all my might!
I won't let them pass this point!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text: Hitomi... Why...

Gazing at the collapsed rock wall, reXer muttered.
However—

name: Red Monster
text: —Gioooh...!!

One monster that leaped out from the front
stole the time of grieving.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text: —Tch!

Quickly turning his body,
reXer regained his balance and fired his crossbow.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Hitomi sacrificed herself to send us forward,
so how can I let myself be defeated here!?

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I have to fight—
for Ryusei, for Ganran, and for Hitomi!!

The arrow fired by reXer's crossbow
directly destroyed the monster's core.

Then, the monster vanished without a sound,
and in its place lay a rock cacao.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
This is the one that was taken back then...!
This monster must have devoured it...

reXer picked up the rock cacao
lying on the ground.

options.text: We got it back before it was digested.
Let's restore peace and make chocolate.
We have to end this battle quickly!

text:
reXer and [Player] gazed at the
rock cacao glowing in their hands.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah... that's right.
We have to gather the rock cacao
with everyone and make chocolate by hand—

name: Boy
text:
...Rock cacao chocolate, when made together,
binds you with an unbreakable "solid bond".

name: Boy
text:
Rock cacao is super hard, so making chocolate is really difficult...
It's important to overcome the difficulties together.

The boy's voice crossed reXer's mind.
The rock cacao, catching the surrounding flames,
vividly reflected the light.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...We too, by overcoming difficulties together,
are surely bound by a solid bond.
A bond that no one can break—

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Even if we're separated now, we must be connected.
—Let's go, [Player].

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
The monster is ahead, right?
...We can't waste the chance Hitomi, everyone, gave us.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
There's no way to respond to everyone other than defeating the monster.
Let's do what we can.

reXer looked up.
The light in his eyes had not yet faded.

[Player] also nodded, and proceeded deeper,
towards the deepest part of Choco Volcano.

There, magma had pooled like a lake,
and hot winds raged around.

Even with reXer's Parallel Weapon,
it was filled with such intense heat that
sweat beaded on his skin.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...[Player].
Is this the right place?
Where is the monster-

At reXer's words,
[Player] looked towards the magma pool.

options.text: It seems to be hiding in here.
It will surely start moving soon.

text:
At [Player]'s words,
reXer nodded silently.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...First strike is crucial, [Player]!
I'll shoot it with my Parallel Weapon
while it's still in the magma.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Tell me its location.
And, please send me as much ViewPower as possible.

However, [Player] looked down
at reXer's words.

options.text: I have almost no ViewPower left...

text:
The ViewPower displayed on
[Player]'s device was very low.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Ah, no, that's right.
You gave it to everyone as power to fight,
so it can't be helped.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Then, let's think together
about what to do, [Player].

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
What we can do now is limited,
but to stop this volcanic rampage,
what we can do...

options.text: ...We need to gather at least some!
The viewers will give us strength.

text:
[Player] activated the drone
and nodded to reXer.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...[Player].
Thank you, you're right.
We have to gather more, much more...!

However, even as they spoke,
a large tremor occurred right nearby,
as if this place was the epicenter.

options.text: We need more people to observe!

text:
Hearing [Player]'s words,
reXer closed his eyes.

He discarded his impatience and
desperately racked his brain.
What could he do now—

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Stand on my own feet,
and show the self I aim to be.
What I can do, because I am me.

Then, reXer looked up and gazed directly
at [Player] with a serious expression.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...I have a favor to ask.
Can you broadcast both the battle live and the recording
to as wide a region as possible?

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
If I absorb the heat with this flying unit of mine,
I think it can reduce the drone's burden.
Then, communication should stabilize.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I'll... make the call.
To all the viewers, so that as much ViewPower
as possible can be gathered.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
As you can see, I'm a member of NeoTalents.
Even though Ryusei and Hitomi aren't here now, surely,
there are people whose hearts my voice will reach.

In reXer's eyes, determination and
fighting spirit burned brightly.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I've always relied on "reXer"'s power.
So now, I want to stand on my own
two feet and show my beloved father.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
My father is no longer here, but...
in my heart, he lives on forever.
He was, is and will always be with me.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
That I've started to be able to fight alone.
That even without borrowing reXer's power...
I can fight.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...So, I want to tell my father,
'Thank you'.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I want everyone who's supporting me to watch me.
...The sight of me standing on my own feet and fighting.

At reXer's words,
[Player] operated the device and responded.

options.text: The drone will wear out faster, but...
I've set it to the very limit of its energy.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, please set the broadcast title to
"Emergency Important Announcement from Cyber Hero 'reXer'"!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Also, can you revert me to my previous suit?
If I'm in that form, I'm sure someone will notice!

[Player] nodded at those words.
And then, they envisioned the dream reXer held as "reXer".

name: reXer
text:
—Thank you, [Player].
Alright, let's gather some views together!

To the surrounding stars,
to everywhere their voices could reach—

[Player] started the broadcast
and signaled reXer to start.

name: reXer
text:
—Everyone watching, can you hear me?
This is reXer, the Cyber Hero.

name: reXer
text:
This is an emergency announcement from ChocoFull.
For those who don't know, please listen first.
We are currently facing a major incident.

name: reXer
text:
This is a part of the intended show.
This is the reality we are facing right now.
...A monster has appeared during filming.

name: reXer
text:
Also, Choco Volcano has started erupting.
First, let me explain the situation—

Facing the camera,
reXer calmly explained the situation.

As the emergency broadcast,
made without going through the agency, began,
viewers' murmuring comments flowed in one after another.

name: Comment
text:
'...Eh, is this true!?
It's not a part of the show...'

name: Comment
text:
'Major announcement, what does that mean?
NeoTalents hasn't announced anything...'

name: Comment
text:
'I've been watching for a while, it's real,
they were fighting a monster too!'

name: Comment
text:
'Where is Hito-chan and Ryusei-sama?
Monsters... Is everyone safe!?'

name: Comment
text:
'reXer, you're sweating a lot...
Is the nearby lava real?
Is it dangerous, are you alright...?'

Amidst various voices—
of doubt, confusion, and surprise—
reXer, with a serious expression, continued to weave his words.

name: reXer
text:
...And one more thing.
Just for a moment, I want everyone to hear this story.

name: reXer
text: ...It's something very important to me.

reXer took a breath for a moment.
Then, as if making a decision, he gazed at the drone.

name: reXer
text:
...The "reXer" you all know,
my current form and name—

name: reXer
text:
Is something I borrowed
from a person who was precious to me.

name: reXer
text:
The original reXer fought a monster-
and then disappeared.
He was forgotten by everyone...

At reXer's words,
the comment speed accelerated even further.

The topic spread like ripples,
and many people began to access the broadcast,
eager to watch.

It was to hear reXer's—
"his" words standing here.

name: reXer
text:
...reXer was cool.
I loved him very much, he was my idol...
He's the person I love.

name: reXer
text:
From that day when I found proof
that "reXer" certainly existed—

name: reXer
text:
I inherited reXer and have worked hard as reXer up to now.
So... I feel a little sad too.

name: reXer
text:
I want to move forward now.
I, as myself.
To the person who I loved, to the person who I deemed precious—

name: reXer
text:
...I want to tell them, 'It's alright now,' and 'Thank you for everything'!
So, please lend me your strength.

note:
From this point onwards, his name is displayed as "Alex" in game,
but for the sake of consistency, I'll keep it as reXer in title.

name: reXer
text:
My true name is—"Alex"!
Alex R. Wilson!

At reXer's words,
[Player]'s device glowed, as if to resonate to his words.
Alex nodded in response to [Player]'s call.

name: reXer
text:
This is my—
my determination as Alex!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text: This is who I truly am!

Enveloped in dazzling light,
Alex's form was repainted.

That sight created even greater murmurs among the viewers,
and the views continued to increase rapidly.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...I think there are still people
among the viewers who don't understand what's happening.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
But I want them to remember this:
the sight of me... is not reXer,
but myself, standing here as a hero.

Alex looked up.
And, he tightly gripped his Parallel Weapon.
His hand was trembling slightly.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...From now onwards, we will fight the monster
nesting inside to suppress the volcano's rampage.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
However, our ViewPower is insufficient.
We've also been separated from Hitomi and Ryusei.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—But, we will absolutely not give up!
Please, everyone! Lend us your strength!
We need everyone's observation now!

At [Player]'s words,
Alex drew his bowstring.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Hitomi, Ryusei, Ganran...
They must be fighting with us too!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
No, not just that.
The heroes I've met, and all the viewers who are supporting me now—

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...There are many people helping me.
I'm not alone.

—Alex looked up. Towards the sky,
far beyond the Choco Volcano surrounded by rock walls.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...So, Father.
Please watch over me with peace of mind.
I can fight alone now—

Chapter 7:
It's Alright, For I Can Walk On My Own

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I'm truly receiving everyone's love!
Watch my determination—
everyone!

[Player] rapidly transferred the rapidly
increasing ViewPower to Alex all at once.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I'll hunt down all the monsters
nesting in the volcano!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—"Pursuit"!
Overlimit Execution!

With a fierce roar, the sharp blow
unleashed by Alex pierced into the magma pool.

The lava surged and rippled, and from its depths,
a low, growling, beast-like roar echoed.

options.text: This presence, this is the boss!

name: Giant Monster
text: —Goooooohhhh...!!

The hidden giant monster appeared from
within the magma with a tremendous rumble.

Twisting its massive body,
as if a mountain itself were moving,
it greatly shook the surrounding ground each time.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...This is the culprit!!
An enemy of this size... no!
[Player], operational support!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Hitomi and the others are fighting too!
Let's go!

At Alex's words,
[Player] nodded and operated the device.

On it, messages of support for Alex were being sent
one after another at an incredible speed.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Thank you for
everything so far, reXer.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
But I cannot be a child forever...!
I'll stand on my own two feet and prove it!

Alex raised his voice towards [Player].
Then, clenching his chest, he confronted the giant monster.

name: Giant Monster
text: —Goooooohhhh...!!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Stay by my side until the very end— [Player]!!
Now, let the quest begin!
Battle Start

note:
The following text is displayed right inside the battle,
so for the best experience, I'd recommend opening the game right beside it!
There's also a very cool starting animation :>

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I'll show my father!
That I can move forward even alone now!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
[Player]!
Operational support, please!
.........Now, quest start!
[Trigger condition: reXer's HP falls below 50%]

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—Tch, the power is just on a different level...!
But everyone had put their trust on me.
I absolutely... cannot give up—

name: Ryusei
text:
—reXer-kun, [Player]-san! Sorry we're late!
We'll lend our strength from here on too!

name: Ganran
text:
[Player], reXer! You guys made it!
You showed me some real guts!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ryusei, Ganran!
You two are safe!

name: Ryusei
text:
Of course, we promised!
...Now, let's defeat this monster and suppress the volcano's rampage!
[Trigger condition: End of Turn 4]

name: Hitomi
text:
Sorry for the wait! I'll fight with everyone too!
Time for an idol warrior to show her true power!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Hitomi!
I knew you'd come back!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
With an unbreakable bond... Surely, we are connected.
Now, let's break through any hardships!
[Trigger condition: End of Turn 7?]

name: Ganran
text:
—Damn it!
It's big, so it's quite resilient...!
Is it still going to attack us!?

name: Hitomi
text:
If the monster rampages any further...
the volcanic eruption might get even more intense!

name: Ryusei
text:
If that happens,
neither we nor the village will be safe...!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, before that happens, I'll achieve victory!
—[Player], please send me your ViewPower!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—I'm going to
finish it off quickly!
